name: Digi Dalek
description: Digi Dalek is a custom Cisco Spark assistance bot, built using botkit from howdyai (https://github.com/howdyai/botkit-starter-ciscospark)

access_token.description: Access Token provided by Cisco Spark

public_address.description: The ssl-enabled url for this app

secret.description: A shared secret used to validate incoming messages from Cisco Spark

studio_token.description: Token associated with your bot in Botkit Studio
